attributes.action: have Herne Bay Pier in Kent rebuilt to its former glory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Herne Bay Pier has been neglected by Canterbury City Council since a storm in 1978 that partially destroyed it. Since that time the local council has destroyed what remained & left the pier head to rot out at sea. At 3,787ft (1147m) Herne Bay pier was the second longest pier in the country, being eclipsed only by Southend-on-Sea.
The history of the pier can be found at hernebaypier.com
The people of Herne Bay and Kent want their pier re-instated.
